situation.title: Concerts
situation.meta_description: Concerts are not allowed to take place.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Concerts are allowed to take place only with no audience present. This applies to both outdoor and indoor concerts. There is also a ban on singing in a group of more than 5 people, the reason being that singing is significantly risky regarding the spread of the virus, since there is a high spread of respiratory droplets.

It is possible to broadcast a concert online. 

This ban has significantly affected the economic situations of musicians, promoters, organisers, clubs, and others. Compensation for the effects of these measures is intended to mitigate this intervention.

questions_answers.question: We're planning a tour for next year. Will it be possible to hold concerts in the spring?
questions_answers.value: Unfortunately, we don't know yet what measures will be necessary in spring. However, the measures for events taking place outside are being relaxed earlier than the ones taking place inside, where the risk of transmission is higher.
